name: wrdexi

body.origin:
|- wcel(cword(c0), universe)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cword(c0), universe))
body.pretty:
⊢ Word(c0)∈ 𝕌
⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
⊣ (c0 ∈ 𝕌 → Word(c0)∈ 𝕌)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cword(c0), universe)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cword(c0), universe))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ Word(c0)∈ 𝕌
⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
⊣ (c0 ∈ 𝕌 → Word(c0)∈ 𝕌)

comment: The set of words over a set is a set, inference form. (Contributed by AV, 23-May-2021.)
